text: James Brown (born 6 May 1988) is an English rugby league footballer who plays as a prop and loose-forward for the Batley Bulldogs in the Betfred Championship. He has previously played for the Swinton Lions in the Championship. Brown has also spent time on loan from Batley at the Keighley Cougars in League 1. ==References== ==External links== *Batley Bulldogs profile Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby league props Category:Swinton Lions players Category:Batley Bulldogs players
title: James Brown (rugby league)
